Verses: 1 karththar Moseyai Nokki: Mundhina Karpalagaigalukku Oththa Irandu Karpalagaigalai Izhaiththukkol; Nee Udaiththuppotta Mundhina Palagaigalil Irundha Vaarththaigalai Avaigalil Ezhudhuven.
2 viigdyarkaalaththil Nee Aayaththamaai, Seenaai Malaiyil Eri, Ange Malaiyin Uchchiyil Kaalame En Samugaththil Vandhu Nil.
3 unnode Oruvanum Ange Varak Koodaadhu; Malaiyilengum Oruvanum Kaanappadavung Koodaadhu; Indha Malaiyin Sameebahthil Aadumaadu Meyavung Koodaadhu Endraar.

4 appozhudhu Mose Mundhina Karpalagaikalukku Oththa Irandu Karpalagaigalai Izhaiththu, Adhikaalame Ezhundhirundhu, Karththar Thanakkuk Kattalaiyittabadiye Avvirandu Karpalagaigalaiyum Than Kaiyile Eduththukkondu, Seenaaimalaiyil Erinaan.
5 karththar Oru Megaththil Irangi, Ange Avan Aruge Nindru, Karththarudaiya Naamaththaik Koorinaar.
6 karththar Avanukku Munbaagak Kadandhupogirapodhu, Avar: Karththar, Karththar; Irakkamum, Kirubaiyum, Neediya Saandhamum, Magaa Dhayaiyum, Saththiyamumulla Dhevan.

7 aayiram Thalaimuraigalukku Irakkaththaik Kaakkiravar; Akkiramaththaiyum Meerudhalaiyum Paavaththaiyum Mannikkiravar; Kutravaaliyaik Kutramatravanaaga Vidaamal, Pidhaakkal Seydha Akkiramaththaip Pillaigalidaththilum, Pillaigaludaiya Pillaigalidaththilum Moondraam Naangaam Thalaimuraimattum Visaarikkiravar Endru Koorinaar.
8 mose Theeviramaagath Tharaimattum Kunindhu Panindhukondu:

9 aandavare, Ummudaiya Kangalil Enakkuk Kirubai Kidaiththadhaanaal, Engal Naduvil Aandavar Ezhundharulavendum; Indha Janangal Vanangaak Kazhuththullavargal; Neero, Engal Akkiramaththaiyum Engal Paavaththaiyum Manniththu, Engalai Umakkuch Sudhandharamaaga Etrukkollum Endraan.

10 adharku Avar: Idho, Naan Oru Udanbadikkai Pannugiren; Boomiyengum Endha Jaadhigalidaththilum Seyyappadaadha Adhisayangalai Un Janangal Ellaarukku Munbaagavum Seyven; Unnodekooda Irukkira Janangal Ellaarum Karththarudaiya Seygaiyaik Kaanbaargal; Unnodekooda Irundhu, Naan Seyyum Kaariyam Bayangaramaayirukkum.
11 indru Naan Unakkuk Kattalaiyidugiradhaik Kaikkol; Emoriyanaiyum, Kaanaaniyanaiyum, Eththiyanaiyum, Perisiyanaiyum, Eviyanaiyum, Eboosiyanaiyum Unakku Munbaagath Thuraththividugiren.
12 nee Poich Serugira Dhesaththin Kudigalodu Udanbadikkaipannaadhabadikku Echcharikkaiyaayiru; Panninaal Adhu Un Naduvil Kanniyaayirukkum.
13 avargaludaiya Balibeedangalai Idiththu, Avargal Silaigalaith Thagarththu, Avargal Thoppugalai Vettippodungal.
14 karththarudaiya Naamam Erichchalullavar Enbadhu, Avar Erichchalulla Dhevane; Aagaiyaal, Anniya Dhevanai Nee Panindhukollavendaam.

15 andhath Dhesaththin Kudigalode Udanbadikkai Pannuvaayaanaal, Avargal Thangal Dhevargalaich Soramaarkkamaaip Pinpatri, Thangaludaiya Dhevargalukkup Baliyiduvaargal; Oruvan Unnai Azhaikkaiyil, Nee Poi, Avan Baliyittadhile Pusippaai;

16 avargal Kumaaraththigalil Un Kumaararukkup Pengalaik Kolluvaai; Avargal Kumaaraththigal Thangal Dhevargalaich Soramaarkkamaaip Pinpatruvadhum Allaamal, Un Kumaararaiyum Thangal Dhevargalaich Soramaarkkamaaip Pinpatrumbadi Seyvaargal.
17 vaarppikkappatta Theyvangalai Ungalukku Undaakkavendaam.

18 pulippillaa Appappandigaiyai Neengal Kaikkondu, Naan Ungalukkuk Kattalaiyittabadiye, Aapeep Maadhaththil Kuriththa Kaalaththile Ezhunaal Pulippillaa Appam Pusikkakkadaveergal; Aapeep Maadhaththile Egipthilirundhu Purappattaaye.
19 karppam Thirandhu Pirakkira Yaavum, Un Aadumaadugalin Thalaiyeetraana Aangal Yaavum Ennudaiyavaigal.

20 kazhudhaiyin Thalaiyeetrai Oru Aattukkuttiyaal Meettukkolvaayaaga; Adhai Meettukkollaadhirundhaal Adhin Kazhuththai Muriththuppodu; Un Pillaigalil Mudharperaanavaigalaiyellaam Meettukkollavendum. Verungaiyode En Sannidhiyil Oruvanum Varak Koodaadhu.
21 aarunaal Velaiseydhu, Ezhaamnaalile Oindhiruppaayaaga; Vidhaippukkaalaththilum Aruppukkaalaththilum Oindhiruppaayaaga.
22 kodhumai Aruppin Mudharpalanaich Seluththum Ezhu Vaarangalin Pandigaiyaiyum, Varushamudivile Serppukkaala Pandigaiyaiyum Aasarippaayaaga.
23 varushaththil Moondrudharam Ungal Aanmakkal Ellaarum Isravelin Dhevanaayirukkira Karththaraagiya Aandavarin Sannidhiyil Varakkadavargal.

24 naan Purajaadhigalai Ungal Munnindru Thuraththivittu, Ungal Ellaigalai Visthaaramaakkuven; Varushaththil Moondrudharam Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Sannidhikku Munbaagak Kaanappadap Poyirukkumbodhu Oruvarum Ungal Dhesaththai Ichchippadhillai.
25 enakku Idum Baliyin Raththaththaip Puliththamaavudan Seluththavendaam; Paskaa Pandigaiyin Baliyai Vidiyarkaalamvaraikkum Vaikkavum Vendaam.
26 ungal Nilaththil Mudhal Mudhal Vilaindha Mudharbalaththai Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Aalayaththukkuk Konduvaarungal. Vellaattukkuttiyai Adhin Thaayin Paalile Samaikkavendaam Endraar.
27 pinnum Karththar Moseyai Nokki: Indha Vaarththaigalai Nee Ezhudhu; Indha Vaarththaigalinbadiye Unnodum Isravelodum Udanbadikkaipanninen Endraar.
28 ange Avan Appam Pusiyaamalum Thanneer Kudiyaamalum Iravum Pagalum Naarpadhunaal Karththarode Irundhaan; Avan Paththuk Karpanaigalaagiya Udanbadikkaiyin Vaarththaigalaip Palagaigalil Ezhudhinaan.
29 mose Saatchip Palagaigal Irandaiyum Than Kaiyil Eduththukkondu, Seenaai Malaiyilirundhu Irangugirapodhu, Thannode Avar Pesinadhinaale Than Mugam Piragaasiththiruppadhai Avan Ariyaadhirundhaan.
30 aaronum Isravel Puththirar Ellaarum Moseyaip Paarkkumbodhu, Avan Mugam Piragaasiththiruppadhaik Kandu, Avan Sameebaththil Serappayandhaargal.
31 mose Avargalai Azhaiththaan; Appozhudhu Aaronum Sabaiyilulla Pirabukkal Yaavarum Avanidaththirkuth Thirumbivandhaargal; Mose Avargalode Pesinaan.
32 pinbu Isravel Puththirar Ellaarum Avanidaththil Serndhaargal; Appozhudhu Avan Seenaaimalaiyil Karththar Thannode Pesinavaigalaiyellaam Avargalukkuk Karpiththaan.
33 mose Avarkalode Pesi Mudiyumalavum, Than Mugaththinmel Mukkaadu Pottirundhaan.

34 mose Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Avarode Pesumbadikku Utpiravesiththadhumudhal Veliye Purappadummattum Mukkaadu Podaadhirundhaan; Avan Veliye Vandhu Thanakkuk Karpikkappattadhai Isravel Puththirarode Sollumbodhu,
35 isravel Puththirar Avan Mugam Piragaasiththiruppadhaik Kandaargal. Mose Avarode Pesumbadikku Ulle Piravesikkumvaraikkum, Mukkaattaith Thirumbath Than Mugaththinmel Pottukkolluvaan.
